section.title: Get Started in Seconds
section.p: Creating your account is very simple, everything's is generated as soon as you create an account so you can get started right away. Access it when and whenever. Your data is always available, and is stored securely just in case something goes wrong.

section.title: Unlimited bank and credit card connections
section.p: Connect your bank accounts swiftly. It is a quick and easy process for customers. The transactions will appear in your bookkeeping automatically, and you do not have to worry about putting information in yourself.

section.title: Keep Track of your business health
section.p: Do you want to keep track of your yearly progress? Look no further. Our reports are easy to use and show month-to-month or year-to-year comparisons so you can easily identify cash flow trends.

section.title: Make tax time a breeze
section.p: When everything is in correct format, tax time is simple. Wave’s smart dashboard organizes your income, expenses, payments, and invoices.

section.title: We’re serious about security
section.p: Bank data connections are read-only and use 256-bit encryption. Servers are housed under physical and electronic protection. Wave is PCI Level-1 certified for handling credit card and bank account information.
